q1: When was the last time Germany won the FIFA World Cup?
a1: 2014 (the one before this year's world cup).
q2: How well did they do this year?
a2: They lost to South Korea in Group F.
q3: They lost because of their defense, they were too defensive and they did not think about defense
a3: Were the German public surprised by that?
q4: Mapping the world and the self
q5: What are Germany's chances in the next World Cup?
a5: According to Westgate Las Vegas they have a 7-1 chance of winning.
